SET.description: Sets the value of a key

SETNX.description: Sets the value of a key only if it does not already exist

GET.description: Gets the value of a key

MGET.description: Gets the values of multiple keys

INCR.description: Increments the integer value of a key

INCRBY.description: Increments the integer value of a key by a given amount

INCRBYFLOAT.description: Increments the float value of a key by a given amount

APPEND.description: Appends a value to a key

STRLEN.description: Gets the length of the value stored in a key

LPUSH.description: Prepend one or more values to a list

RPUSH.description: Append one or more values to a list

LPOP.description: Removes and returns the first element of a list

RPOP.description: Removes and returns the last element of a list

LRANGE.description: Gets a range of elements from a list

LLEN.description: Gets the length of a list

LINSERT.description: Inserts an element before or after another element in a list

SADD.description: Adds one or more members to a set

SREM.description: Removes one or more members from a set

SMEMBERS.description: Gets all the members in a set

SISMEMBER.description: Checks if a member exists in a set

SINTER.description: Returns the intersection of multiple sets

SUNION.description: Returns the union of multiple sets

SDIFF.description: Returns the difference between multiple sets

SMOVE.description: Moves a member from one set to another

SCARD.description: Gets the number of members in a set

HSET.description: Sets the value of a field in a hash

HGET.description: Gets the value of a field in a hash

HGETALL.description: Gets all fields and values in a hash

HDEL.description: Deletes one or more fields from a hash

HINCRBY.description: Increments the integer value of a field in a hash

HINCRBYFLOAT.description: Increments the float value of a field in a hash

HKEYS.description: Gets all the fields in a hash

HVALS.description: Gets all the values in a hash

ZADD.description: Adds one or more members to a sorted set, or updates their score

ZRANGE.description: Gets a range of members in a sorted set

ZREVRANGE.description: Gets a range of members in a sorted set, ordered from highest to lowest score

ZREM.description: Removes one or more members from a sorted set

ZRANK.description: Gets the rank of a member in a sorted set

ZSCORE.description: Gets the score of a member in a sorted set

ZINCRBY.description: Increments the score of a member in a sorted set

ZCARD.description: Gets the number of members in a sorted set

PFCOUNT.description: Returns the approximated cardinality of elements in a HyperLogLog

MULTI.description: Marks the start of a transaction block

EXEC.description: Executes all commands issued after MULTI

DISCARD.description: Discard all commands issued after MULTI

WATCH.description: Watch one or more keys for modifications

PUBLISH.description: Posts a message to a channel

SUBSCRIBE.description: Subscribes to one or more channels

UNSUBSCRIBE.description: Unsubscribes from one or more channels

EXPIRE.description: Sets an expiration time for a key

TTL.description: Gets the time to live of a key

PERSIST.description: Removes the expiration time from a key
